title: An Act establishing a Norwood hospital working group

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Rogers of Norwood, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2525) of John H. Rogers relative to establishing a Norwood hospital working group.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
